## Id type

A Hop ID is a string that starts with a prefix and a underscore, followed by some unique text. It is a Pika ID â€” https://github.com/hopinc/pika

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare type Id<T extends IdPrefixes> = `${T}_${string}`;
```
